content.raw:
This didn't break `ign-transport` itself, but it broke `ign-sensors`'s [Windows](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ign_sensors-ign-2-win/31/consoleFull) build:

```
D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_sensors-ign-2-win\ws\ign-transport\src\NodeShared.cc(97,16): error C2039: 'send_flags': is not a member of 'zmq' [D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_sensors-ign-2-win\ws\build\ignition-transport7\src\ignition-transport7.vcxproj]
```

The sensors failing CI ran on `windows.win32`, while the successful `ign-transport` CI ran on `windows_nuc.win10`. Maybe they have different ZMQ versions installed?
content.html:
This didn't break ign-transport itself, but it broke ign-sensors's Windows build:

D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_sensors-ign-2-win\ws\ign-transport\src\NodeShared.cc(97,16): error C2039: 'send_flags': is not a member of 'zmq' [D:\Jenkins\workspace\ign_sensors-ign-2-win\ws\build\ignition-transport7\src\ignition-transport7.vcxproj]

The sensors failing CI ran on windows.win32, while the successful ign-transport CI ran on windows_nuc.win10. Maybe they have different ZMQ versions installed?
